HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: Patched Better Pawn Control for hatched/birthed animals to inherit the entire policy of their parent.
Shift + scroll wheel on area restrictions will cycle them for all listed pawns (colonist or animal). Also recommended: VouLT's Better Pawn Control for policies.
Butchers now include non-vanilla insectoid and humanlike in their counts. Butcher small creature recipe is now calculated and will work with content mods.
Cannibal and insect meal separation now supports non-vanilla insectoid and humanlike. Thanks @lbmaian for the suggestion.

Deny distant material supply jobs. Do not supply directly from a resource if hauling it to storage would bring it closer to the given blueprint.
